name: Little adventure (itch) (ENOOPS Games)
description:
Little adventure is a 2D platformer adventure game with beautiful graphics. You have to play as an assistant to the blacksmith named Ben and, together with the blacksmith, go to the castle to the king to give the legendary sword! Immerse yourself in a fantasy world full of danger and adventure!

Start your journey in a wonderful forest, go through intricate levels, but beware of enemy creatures and clear the forest from monsters!

Features:

• Beautiful graphics

• Wonderful soundtrack

• Interesting characters

• Pleasant atmosphere
